title: Luxury goods market worldwide by segment share in 2007 and 2012
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
For Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the highest Segment share 443.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2007 had the lowest Segment share 10.0.
The maximum Segment share for 2007 that was found in Race Fashion / Apparel was 44.3 times larger than the minimum Segment share observed in Race Other.
Averaging all 2 groups 2007, and 2012, the Race Fashion / Apparel is the maximum Segment share and Other is the minimum Segment share.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
Race Fashion / Apparel had the maximum Segment share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2007. The minimum Segment share was observed in Race Other for 2007.

For Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the highest Segment share 443.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2007 had the lowest Segment share 10.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Segment share on the Y-axis for 5 different Races for 2 groups 2007, and 2012 that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Fashion / Apparel had the maximum Segment share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2007. The minimum Segment share was observed in Race Other for 2007.
For Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the maximum Segment share and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 5 Races.
The maximum Segment share for 2007 that was found in Race Fashion / Apparel was 44.3 times larger than the minimum Segment share observed in Race Other.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Segment share was found in case of 2007.
Averaging all 2 groups 2007, and 2012, the Race Fashion / Apparel is the maximum Segment share and Other is the minimum Segment share.
